title: Cant make posts
body: so I am level 36 in game, but only level 6 in forums... what would it take to get my level up in forums to post threads?

replies.body: Ahhhh sometimes this boards level needs a little poke to get its level correctly updated with your Summoner level. Posting here in H&S or using the Syncing Tool up top should get the job done automatically ^_^
